title: Yokkaichi, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar URQ, ULQ
description: a man runs after his hat that was caught in the wind at LL; another windblown traveler crossing a bridge at R pulls his cloak tightly against his body; wetlands and moored boats in background, a moored boat in foreground at LR
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
